title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
created_time: February 17, 2023, 04:47:51 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:02:22 PM by krogothmanhattan
content: If anyone has any information or has one to sell please reach out to me via PM. Been looking for one for years!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: you have been looking for one of these for a while - I recall reading your older thread last year. I also added it to my WTB list

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 17, 2023, 05:48:44 PMyou have been looking for one of these for a while - I recall reading your older thread last year. I also added it to my WTB list  Yeah I think I started looking for one back in 2017...so its been close to 6 years already.  The hunt is still ongoing,,,maybe someday someone will come across one and reach out

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: The maker's post here, he admits at the bottom that the picture of the "Firmcoin" card is photoshoped and not the actual product... so the prototypes might not look anything like thathttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=232898.msg2454703#msg2454703And their post here tells that the project was abandoned and cards never produced:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=232898.msg21617369#msg21617369But interesting that a new company/design came out of it... "Digibill" / Doorsa

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Well then - would be super hard to find then lol - it says only a few prototypes were made.As for Doorsa, sounds like that died as well.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on February 18, 2023, 03:00:15 PMThe maker's post here, he admits at the bottom that the picture of the "Firmcoin" card is photoshoped and not the actual product... so the prototypes might not look anything like thathttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=232898.msg2454703#msg2454703And their post here tells that the project was abandoned and cards never produced:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=232898.msg21617369#msg21617369But interesting that a new company/design came out of it... "Digibill" / Doorsa  Thanks for sharing this MJ....So this will make it even harder to find a card. The search must go on thru the highways and byways of the Bitcoin superhighway!
